page.title: 06HARBOUR MASTER - COWES
page.content: Our Harbour Master is a qualified sea captain.He has to pilot large cargo vessels up the river as well as help thousands of yachts that visit Cowes each year.He places buoys as sign posts and checks that the fairway is clear.Every year he finds a place for the Royal Yacht Britannia for Cowes Week.In his office a record is kept of cargo ships that go up and down the river.Shingle ballast and grain are the main exports and stone,pumice and fuels are the main imports.There are harbour dues to be paid by every user. The 19 Harbour Commissioners meet once a month in the Harbour Office at the Town Quay.The present Harbour Master has been there for 18 years.He is a cheerful man and enjoys his job.
